description: Aspose.Tasks is a class library for working with Microsoft Project files. Using Aspose.Tasks for .NET you can work with MPP, MPT, XML, XLSX, HTML, PDF, XAML and other formats in your applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

    Features

    TASKS-33656 Review and update project data reading/writing summary
    TASKS-33652 Implement Tables data writing to mpp
    TASKS-33648 Read TimescaleStart, TimescaleFinish values from mpp 2003-13 files
    TASKS-33636 Implement recalculation of tasks with splits.
    TASKS-33656 Implement Task.IsPublished flag reading/writing for mpp 2007-2013.
    TASKS-33656 Implement CanSplitInProgressTasks flag writing to mpp 2003-2013.
    TASKS-33652 Implement Tables data writing to 2010-13 mpp formats
    TASKS-33652 Implement Tables data writing to 2007 mpp format
    TASKS-33652 Implement Tables data writing to 2003 mpp format
    TASKS-33636 Debug splits recalculation.
    TASKS-33636 Refactor rescheduling to move splits and dates.
    TASKS-33636 Imeplement splits recalculation.   
    TASKS-33649 Print each/selected page of a Project to PNG/JPEG
    TASKS-33621 Option to read timescale data from source xml/mpp and make effective in output image/pdf file
    TASKS-33229 Configure Gantt Chart view by showing selected custom fields when opened in MSP
    TASKS-22999 Add reading support of XML files created by OpenProj.   
    TASKS-33317 Investigate compatibility issue of DLL with Delphi Prism XE 1, with Visual 2010 or with RemObjects 3.0
    TASKS-33630 PrePopulate dates while rendering project data to PDF similar to MSP
    TASKS-33620 Option to set Timescale count

    Bug fixes

    TASKS-33637 Scheduling ignores resource calendars.
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
